summary: This is an email chain from December 2018 discussing a call to touch base regarding lawmakers calling on the DOJ to explain the Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA). The emails coordinate a call time of 11:00.

events.title: Call scheduled regarding Epstein NPA
events.description: A call is scheduled for 11:00 to discuss lawmakers' calls for the DOJ to explain the Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement.

events.title: Lawmakers demand probe into Epstein deal
events.description: Various lawmakers call on the DOJ to explain the 'sweetheart deal' given to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: In December 2018, lawmakers were calling for an investigation into the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) given to Jeffrey Epstein.
The email chain coordinates a call to discuss the situation, scheduled for 11:00 on December 7, 2018.
The document references a news article from NBC News about lawmakers demanding a probe into Epstein's 'sweetheart deal'.
